Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Your consciousness seems to have sunken underwater, your body slowly waking from a long slumber.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryZhengyan.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory731.jpg'}
{3: 'Someone gently slaps you on your cheek, the warm touch bringing you some clarity.'}
{1: 'FxUiStoryZhengyan'}
{3: 'In your blurry, dim vision, you see a familiar figure crouched in front of you, his hand waving before your eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "Oh, you're awake? The world has been destroyed by the Punishing Virus.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Startled by the horrifying words, you instinctively sit up straight and survey the surroundings, only to find yourself having merely taken a nap in a conservation area lounge.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'But the familiar setting heightens your alertness.'}
{3: 'Because an "unexpected person" is standing before you.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'Alright, calm down. I was just teasing you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'You were taking a short nap during your mission, and I, your malicious enemy, took the opportunity to sneak in and watch you for a while.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The silver-haired Ascendant smiles and waves, but you cannot discern the truth in his words still.'}
{2: 'What... do you want?', 3: '24'}
{3: 'Your memories gradually flood back, and you recall what happened before you arrived on the surface. You fell asleep directly upon returning to the conservation area after the tiring events.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'What do you think I want? Or have you forgotten what day it is?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Before you can answer, a cold metal box is thrust into your hands.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Now you know, right?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Indeed. I'm here for your birthday.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'At that moment, you finally notice a bouquet of flowers on the small table beside the bed, placed there by someone unknown.'}
{3: 'The sunlight outside the window is not the usual bright morning light but more like the early dawn.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Sneaking in to offer you this blessing before the guards find out wasn't easy.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Have you thought about how to thank me, Gray Raven Commandant?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Roland sits at your bedside in the hazy morning light, looking at you with a half-smile.'}
{2: "...I don't believe you.", 3: '36', 4: 'Why give me a blessing?', 5: '37'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'That\'s fine by me. A "blessing" is something that takes effect as soon as it\'s given.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Hmm... Why? Maybe I wanted to celebrate with my worthy rival for a year of good fight?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Aren't you going to open this box?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Don\'t worry, there\'s nothing strange inside. It\'s just a simple "gift."', 4: '2'}
{3: "Under Roland's watchful gaze, you slowly open the box to find it filled with glistening candies."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Would you trust a gift from an enemy? Maybe I sprinkled some poison in there too.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "If you don't believe me, how about I fetch you some testing kits?", 4: '2'}
{2: "There's no need.", 3: '45'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Oh? And why is that?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Roland raises an eyebrow nonchalantly.'}
{2: "You've had plenty of chances to make a move since the beginning. There's no need for such roundabout tactics.", 3: '48'}
{2: "So, I'll trust you that this really is just a simple gift.", 3: '49'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "I see. Who would've thought the Gray Raven Commandant could be so sentimental at times?", 4: '2'}
{3: "Roland's ever-present smile seems a bit more mysterious at that moment."}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Anyway, I\'ve delivered my "gift." It\'s up to you what you want to do with it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'The sun is about to rise. Time for me to exit the stage.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Roland stands up from the bed and walks toward the door.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Goodbye. If there's a next year... I'll send you my blessings again.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The silver-haired figure opens the door, letting the golden morning light flood in before turning back with one last smile.'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: 'Happy birthday, 【kuroname】.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{3: 'Your birthday party with Gray Raven this year has ended as lively as ever. After the party, you return to the lounge alone.'}
{3: 'Back then, the researchers eagerly tested the candy upon your return to Babylonia—just as Roland said, they were just candies. Just a "gift"... and nothing more.'}
{3: 'As the digital clock nears midnight, your eyes are drawn to a small, familiar box on the desk.'}
{3: 'You are certain it was not there during the day.'}
{3: "You quickly stand up and examine the box under the light. Sure enough, there is a classy birthday card written in cursive, expressing the Ascendant's blessings."}
{3: '"Happy birthday. The candies from last year must be finished by now."'}
